original: Upādānanti cattāri upādānāni kāmupādānaṁ diṭṭhupādānaṁ sīlabbatupādānaṁ attavādupādānanti upādānaṁ.
analyzed: upādānanti cattāri upādānāni kāma upādānam diṭṭha upādānam sīla bbata upādānam atta vāda upādānam atta vāda upādānam atta vāda upādānam
corrected: upādānanti cattāri upādānāni kāma upādānam diṭṭha upādānam sīla bbata upādānam atta vāda upādānam ti upādānam

original: Bhavoti tayo bhavā kāmabhavo rūpabhavo arūpabhavo.
analyzed: tayaḥ bhavā kāma bhavaḥ rūpa bhavaḥ a rūpa bhavaḥ
corrected: bhavoti tayaḥ bhavā kāma bhavaḥ rūpa bhavaḥ a rūpa bhavaḥ

original: Jarā nāma yaṁ taṁ khaṇḍiccaṁ pāliccaṁ valittacatā pavivittaṁ catunnaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ
analyzed: jarā nāma yam tam khaṇḍiccam pāliccam pavivittam catunnam
corrected: jarā nāma yam tam khaṇḍiccam pāliccam valittacatā pavivittam catunnam mahābhūtānam

original: Iti purimikā ca jarā idañca maraṇaṁ tadubhayaṁ jarāmaraṇaṁ.
analyzed: iti ca jarā idam ca maraṇam tat ubhayam jarā maraṇa
corrected: iti purimikā ca jarā idam ca maraṇam tat ubhayam jarā maraṇam

analyzed: vaṇṇa saṅgahaṇa lakkhaṇā subha saññā tassāḥ padaṭṭhāna
corrected: vaṇṇa saṅgahaṇa lakkhaṇā subha saññā tassā indriya asaṁvaro padaṭṭhānaṁ

original: Tattha ariyasannissayalakkhaṇo patirūpadesavāso, so sappurisūpanissayassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: tattha ariya sannissaya lakkhaṇo so sappurisa upanissayassa padaṭṭhāna
corrected: tattha ariya sannissaya lakkhaṇo patirūpadesa vāso so sappurisa upanissayassa padaṭṭhānaṁ

analyzed: sammā paṭipatti lakkhaṇam tam puññānam padaṭṭhāna
corrected: sammā paṭipatti lakkhaṇam atta sammā paṇidhānam tam puññānam padaṭṭhānam

original: Anāgāmiphalañca yaṁ avijjāvirāgā vimuccati, ayaṁ katābhūmi.
analyzed: anāgāmi phalam ca yam avijjā virāgā vimuccati ayam
corrected: anāgāmi phalam ca yam avijjā virāgā vimuccati ayam katā bhūmi

original: yathā dose tathā nioṭṭhānā, ayaṁ byāpādo nīvaraṇaṁ.
corrected: yathā dose tathā nioṭṭhānā ayaṁ byāpādo nīvaraṇaṁ

original: Kāmacchando alobhato kusalamūlato nivārayati, byāpādo adosato nivārayati, thinamiddhaṁ
analyzed: kāmacchandaḥ a lobhataḥ kusala mūlataḥ nivārayati byāpādaḥ a dosataḥ nivārayati
corrected: kāmacchandaḥ a lobhataḥ kusala mūlataḥ nivārayati byāpādaḥ a dosataḥ nivārayati thinamiddhaṁ
